data_table.description: Menopause and Estrogen, Offspring Cohort Exams 1 - 8. Data collected include cause of menopause, status of estrogen use and number of ovaries removed. Issues found during chart review as well as other important observations and cautions about this data set can be found in the corresponding protocol document.

variable.name: APPROX
variable.comment: When STOP_AGE was reported in an inconsistent manner, STOP_AGE was assigned based on the following statement: for women reporting a stop age younger than age at exam where periods were reported not stopped, STOP_AGE was assigned the age at the last attended exam reporting menses plus 1 year.

variable.name: OVREM1
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 1
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM2
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 2
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM3
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 3
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM4
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 4
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM5
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 5
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM6
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 6
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM7
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 7
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST7
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST1
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST2
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST3
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST4
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST5
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST6
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: OVREM8
variable.description: Report of number of ovaries removed, cumulative at exam 8
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: EST8
variable.value: unknown or did not attend exam

variable.name: STOP_AGE
variable.comment: The original questionnaire asked: "Periods stopped one year or more?" y/n, if yes, then age periods stopped was asked See STOP_AGELTY for cases where periods stopped less than one year. Version 1: 9-2-2009 Removed "19-63 age range" from code values and made it the min and max values.
variable.value: not stopped as of last attended exam
unknown as of last attended exam or cause=4 (used hormones before periods stopped and stop age could not be determined)

variable.name: CAUSE
variable.comment: see protocol for more discussion on STOP_AGE and CAUSE
variable.value: not stopped as of last attended exam
hormone use before reporting periods stopped (in most cases STOP_AGE="." in some cases STOP_AGE was determined through chart review)

variable.name: STOP_AGELTY
variable.description: Indicates that periods stopped less than a year after STOP_AGE
variable.value: periods stopped one year or more
periods stopped less then a year after STOP_AGE
